Welcome

BSEB Bihar Board OFSS Class 11th, 12th Admission Online Form 2021

Bihar School Examination Board (BSEB) has Recently Invited to Online Application Form for the Class 11th and 12th (Intermediate) Admission 2021. Those Candidates Who are Interested to this Admission and Have All Eligibility Criteria Can Read the Full Notification Before Apply Online.

Bihar School Examination Board (BSEB)

Class 11th & 12th Common Application Form Admission 2021

WWW.E-SARKARIRESULT.IN

Important Dates

  • Online Application Start : 19 June 2021
  • Registration Last Date : 28 June 2021
  • Fee Payment Last Date : 28 June 2021
  • Exam Date : Notified Soon
  • Admit Card Available : Notified Soon

Application Fee

    • General, OBC Candidates : Rs. 350/-
    • SC, ST Candidates : Rs. 350/-

Eligibility Details

  • Candidates Passed Class 10th (High School)/ Matric Exam from BSEB/ ICSE/ CBSE Board.
  • Read the Notification for More Details.

 Admission Details

Course NameSession
Class 11th and 12th2021-23

How to Apply

  • Bihar Board Class 11th, 12th Admission 2021.
  • All Interested Candidates can Apply Online from 19/06/2021 to 28/06/2021.
  • Read the Notification for More Details about BSEB Bihar Board 11th Intermediate Admission.
  • Kindly Fill Your Basic Details and Upload Your Photo, Sign, ID Proof and Other Documents.
  • Check Your full Details Preview Before Submit Application Form.
  • Pay Required Application Fee to Complete Form. If Fees are Asked.
  • Take a Print Out of Submit Final Form for Further Process.

Interested Candidates can Read the Full Notification Before Apply Online.
